thread.title: BA-owner IAG says considering offer for Norwegian

title: BA-owner IAG says considering offer for Norwegian
text:
BA-owner IAG says considering offer for Norwegian 12:42pm EDT - 01:09 
British Airways-owner IAG has said it is considering making an offer for Norwegian, a low-cost carrier worth about $1.2 billion, in a deal which would expand its budget offerings and give it control of a struggling rival. Sonia Legg reports
